data.speaker: User
data.message: Hi can I know whether I need to cite a picture I took from instagram but I will be inserting in canva to create it to like a poster. Do i still need to cite the picture ? if so do i cite inside the poster ?

data.speaker: User
data.message: Additionally, can I know whether i can insert my in text citations inside the budget ? cuase I took the information directly from a webisite

data.speaker: User
data.message: So you are embedding a budget table inside a canva to create a poster?

data.speaker: User
data.message: NO the budget is a different question. Sorry for the inconveniene caused

data.speaker: User
data.message: ohh okay so do i need to include the citation inside the poster ?

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: Hi PERSON_FIRSTNAME_1, Good afternoon to you. How can I help you today?

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: Thank you for sending me the image preview, may I know what is this information for?

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: You need to cite the image taken from Instagram if its is not under any creative common license.

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: You can include an attribution to the author under the image and then include it in the references.
